name: Adam Smith
education: University of Glasgow, Balliol College, Oxford
notable_works: An Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations
awards: Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh
quote: It is not from the benevolence of the butcher, the brewer, or the baker that we expect our dinner, but from their regard to their own interest.

name: Michael Jordan
known_for: Legendary basketball career with the Chicago Bulls
education: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
